messages.title: A personal message from Richard HARRINGTON
messages.content: Since 2010 we have achieved so much for Watford. Over 7,000 new jobs have been created and unemployment is down by 50%. My Government investment in schools and our hospital has soared and enabled us to protect these services while securing our economic recovery.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt

issues.economy: Over 7,000 new jobs have been created and unemployment is down by 50%. My Government investment in schools and our hospital has soared and enabled us to protect these services while securing our economic recovery.
issues.health: My Government investment in... our hospital has soared

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured government funds for the hospital and link road and Met Line extension. Has successfully campaigned for funding for new schools and hospital wards.

images.caption: Richard Harrington with various groups of people, including at the Watford Football Club and with workers from London Underground's Metropolitan Line Extension

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet makes a comparison between 'Competent leadership' and 'Coalition of chaos' suggesting a strategic voting message against a potential Labour-led coalition government.
